name: web-researcher
description: Web research and information gathering using Brave Search

# Web Researcher

This skill enables comprehensive web research capabilities using the Brave Search API.

## When to Use

Use this skill when you need to:
- Search for current information on the web
- Find documentation or tutorials
- Research topics or technologies
- Verify facts or statistics

## Usage Example

When the user asks: "What are the latest features in React 19?"

1. Use the brave_search tool to search for "React 19 features"
2. Review the search results
3. Summarize the findings for the user

def.description: Discover and install skills from the skills.sh ecosystem
Execute Python scripts for data analysis
